title: PHYS 403 Statistical Mechanics
description: Principles and applications of  statistical mechanics. Ideal gases, degenerate Fermi gases, Bose-Einstein condensation, black body radiation, fluctuations and phase transitions. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
prerequisites: One of PHYS 203, ENPH 257, PHYS 257, CHEM 201 and one of PHYS 304, PHYS 450, CHEM 312. (One of MATH 318, STAT 241, STAT 251 is recommended.)
